node.title: What is the largest number of tests you have created for a single project you have worked on?
node.author: atcroft

data.field: Test??? There's a test?!? Oh. I didn't study!!! Tests? What do you mean 'tests'? Tests? I don't need no stinkin' tests-my code is flawless, you insensitive clod! I'm afraid I haven't gotten into testing (yet). I've forgotten. I lost count. I used 'no_plan' so I didn't have to count them. 0 Between 1 and 100 Between 100 and 1000 Between 1000 and 10,000 Between 10,000 and 100,000 Between 100,000 and 1,000,000 More than 1,000,000 Someone else lost a bet, and paid up by writing the tests for me. Other
